FILE: cm702704v11.0.txt
DYAD: TADZHIKISTAN-UZBEKISTAN
RIVALRY: RIV1287
DISPUTE(S): MID4179 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190430
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190430

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4421

TERRMID: MID4421 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID4421 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4421 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4421 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4421 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4421 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4421 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4421 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4421 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4421 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4421 from cm narrative, on March 24, 2004 Uzbek border guards shot a Tajik civilian who was allegedly collecting scrap metal on Uzbek territory. Coded not civil war because the civilian was not part of a militarized rebel group. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4421 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4421 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4421 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4421 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4421 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4421 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4179

TERRMID: MID4179 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID4179 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4179 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4179 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4179 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4179 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4179 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4179 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4179 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4179 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4179 from Gibler 2018, in 1999 Uzbekistan bombed Tajik territory while targeting militarized rebels. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militarized rebels in Tajikistan, within this dyad. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4179 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4179 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4179 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4179 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4179 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4179 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4427

TERRMID: MID4427 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID4427 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4427 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4427 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4427 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4427 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4427 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4427 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4427 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4427 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4427 from cm narrative and Gibler 2018, in 2005 Tajikistan fortified its border with Uzbekistan, citing security concerns from domestic unrest in Uzbekistan. Coded civil war MID because there was an active militarized rebel group targeting Uzbekistan and contributing to the domestic unrest, against which Tajikistan responded. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4427 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4427 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4427 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4427 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4427 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4427 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4433

TERRMID: MID4433 1 -- territorial MID
TERRMID-CER: MID4433 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID4433 from Gibler 2018 and cm narrative, the border between Uzbekistan and Tajikistan was not fully delimited, leading to repeated clashes. In 2006, a clash led to one Uzbek border guard being killed. Coded territorial MID because this was connected to a territorial dispute. 

TERRLINK: MID4433 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4433 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4433 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4433 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4433 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4433 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4433 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4433 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4433 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4433 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4433 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4433 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4433 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4433 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4421
rivalry=702704 nationa=UZBEKISTAN nationb=Tajikistan MID4421 20040320-20040320 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=
0 lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

On March 24, 2004 Uzbek border guards shot a Tajik civilian who was allegedly collecting scrap metal on Uzbek territory. First day of dispute was on 3/20/2004 and last day of dispute was on 3/20/2004.

MID4427
rivalry=702704 nationa=Tajikistan nationb=UZBEKISTAN MID4427 20050513-20051102 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE
fatalpb=0 lhostb=DISPLAY OF FORCE 

Tajikistan fortifies its border with Uzbekistan on 5/13/2005, citing instability in the latter state as a cause. Uzbekistan then closes its border with Tajikistan. On 11/2/2005, Tajikistan again fortifies its border with Uzbekistan. First day of dispute was on 5/13/2005 and last day of dispute was on 11/02/2005.

MID4433
rivalry=702704 nationa=Tajikistan nationb=UZBEKISTAN MID4433 20060926-20061207 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=
0 lhostb=DISPLAY OF FORCE 

This MID is comprised of multiple incidents wherein Tajik border guards fire upon Uzbek civilians or territory. In one case, an Uzbek border guard had violated the Tajik border. Incidents such as these have occurred with relative frequency, in part because the border between the two is mined and not fully delimited. First day of dispute was on 9/26/2006 and last day of dispute was on 12/7/2006.

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4179
rivalry=702704 nationa=UZBEKISTAN nationb=Tajikistan MID4179 19990815-19991003 
 revtype1a=OTHER revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0 lhostb=
NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

This dispute consisted of 2 incidents in which Uzbek fighters bombed Tajik territory in an attempt to destroy rebel forces that had fled to Tajikistan. The Uzbek actions were initially denied by Uzbekistan but were later admitted. Tajikistan protested both bombings. This dispute consisted of 2 incidents in which Uzbek fighters bombed Tajik territory in an attempt to destroy rebel forces that had fled to Tajikistan. The Uzbek actions were initially denied by Uzbekistan but were later admitted. Tajikistan protested both bombings. First day of dispute was on 8/15/1999 and last day of dispute was on 10/3/1999.

RIVNOTES: 

MID4179 This dispute consisted of 2 incidents in which Uzbek fighters bombed Tajik territory in an attempt to destroy rebel forces that had fled to Tajikistan. The Uzbek actions were initially denied by Uzbekistan but were later admitted. Tajikistan protested both bombings. This dispute consisted of 2 incidents in which Uzbek fighters bombed Tajik territory in an attempt to destroy rebel forces that had fled to Tajikistan. The Uzbek actions were initially denied by Uzbekistan but were later admitted. Tajikistan protested both bombings.

Discussion:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
